name: Ramen Express (johnperes)
description:
Your job is to cook ramen for your costumers

Thanks for all the feedback!

Update 1.1 - Added a tooltip in the ingredients, and a tip for the chopsticks to help in the clarity

How to play

  • Look what the costumer wants
  • Drag and drop the ingredients into the bowl
  • After the Bowl is complete drag and drop into the costumer table
  • Better played fullscreen

Music Credits

  • Xia Yu by Guifrog

This game was made by johnperes for the Weekly Game Jam 156 with the theme "Noodle".
